bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I love to eat leaves and make a ball! What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I start as a tiny egg.
🌿 I love to munch on plants.
⚽ I sometimes roll up when scared.

bug.question: I buzz around flowers and make sweet treats for all to devour! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow and black.
🌷 I collect nectar from flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive with my family.

bug.question: I jump really high and am green like the grass. I make a chirping sound as I pass! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I blend in with the green.
🦗 I have very strong legs.
🎶 My song is called a chirp.

bug.question: I am a tiny worker, always on the go. Building hills of dirt, high and low! What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and strong.
🏘️ I live in a colony.
🏔️ I create mounds of dirt.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly through the air. I used to be a caterpillar, I declare! What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 My wings are often beautiful.
🐛 I change a lot during my life.
🌸 I like to visit flowers.

bug.question: I light up the night, a twinkling bright spark. I’m a beetle, but glow in the dark! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I create my own light.
🌃 You often see me at night.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web, to catch a tasty snack. I have eight legs you see, is there any turning back? What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I'm known for my silk.
🕷️ I have more legs than most bugs.
🎣 I'm a master of catching other insects.

bug.question: I can walk on water, it’s quite a fun trick! I glide across the surface, really quick! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live near water.
🚶 My legs help me stay afloat.
💨 I move very fast.

bug.question: I fly around at night and eat pesky mosquitoes. Some people think I look like a tiny demon, but I am here to help. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I come out when it is dark
🦟 I love to eat things you dont want to be bitten by
🍃 I have a long thin body

bug.question: I'm known for my bite, and buzzing near your ear. I like to feast on blood, so beware, my dear! What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I am a very annoying bug.
🩸 I need your blood to make babies.
🖐️ I leave itchy bumps behind.

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I can take you to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🏫 Many children ride me to school
🛑 I stop to pick up children
🚌 I am big and yellow (sometimes!)

transport.question: I float on water and can take you to another land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need a lot of water to move
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat
🗺️ People travel on me to far away places

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you very far, very fast. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly high above the clouds
✈️ I have wings and an engine
🌎 I can take you to another country

transport.question: I have two wheels and you have to pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You can ride me in a park
👧 You need a helmet when riding me
🔔 I often have a bell to ring

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I only go where there are special tracks
🚏 I stop at stations
🚇 You can travel underground in me

transport.question: I help put out fires quickly. I have a ladder and a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud noise
👨‍🚒 Firefighters drive me
🔥 I carry water to put out fires

transport.question: I have a motor and two wheels but I am not a bicycle. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle
🪖 You should always wear a helmet while riding me
💨 I make a loud noise

transport.question: I’m a vehicle that can fly, but I don’t have wings. I have a spinning blade on top.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place
🚑 I am used for air ambulances.
⬆️ I go straight up!

transport.question: I carry things but I am not a car and have a big container attached to me. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often carry goods from factories to shops
🚚 I am bigger than a car
🛣️ You see me on the highways

transport.question: I go very fast, far away from Earth, and explore the universe. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me
🚀 I fly to the moon and beyond
🌌 I explore space
